transitions.condition: not (doc.stock_entry_type == "Material Transfer" and doc.from_warehouse in ["Merchandise WH1 - TSF", "Merchandise WH2 - TSF"])
doc.stock_entry_type == "Material Transfer" and doc.from_warehouse in ["Merchandise WH1 - TSF", "Merchandise WH2 - TSF"]
frappe.session.user == doc.final_approving_authority and not doc.first_approving_authority and not doc.recommended_by

frappe.session.user == doc.recommended_by or (frappe.session.user == doc.final_approving_authority and not doc.first_approving_authority and not doc.recommended_by) or (frappe.session.user == doc.first_approving_authority and not doc.recommended_by)
